configuration.init.choose.title: Initialization
configuration.init.choose.message: Your software has to be initialized. You may either create a new currency or connect to an existing one.
configuration.create_uid.title: Your identity
configuration.create_uid.message:
As a first step, you need to define your personal, unique identity.
The following informations will be definitive for this currency: please choose them carefully.
configuration.create_uid.uid.tooltip: The name you will be known as.
configuration.create_uid.entropy.tooltip: An entropy source to make your key unique: an e-mail, a phone nÂ°, ...
configuration.create_uid.password.toolti: A secret password to protect your key.
configuration.create_uid.modal_message: This identity will be definitive for this currency: you will be known by your User ID and will be able to access your account using your Entropy and Password values.
configuration.create_network.title: Network
configuration.create_network.message: uCoin is a P2P software and needs bidirectionnal access to the network. Please chose carefully the following parameters.
configuration.create_network.local.title: Local
configuration.create_network.local.messa: The local network interface is the technical interface the software will be listening to for receiving documents from the Internet as a P2P entity. This address will be private.
configuration.create_network.remote.mess: The remote network interface is the address your node will be available at. This address will be public and visible by anyone.
